1.scrap all channels and return the list of data(title, url, thumb) in response on page load
2.client should be able to preview channel data like title, thumb and stream video.
3.client should be able to select one more data to be send to server to generate a downloadable .m3u file.
4.since asynchronous iterations are random, use socket.io to visualize the scrapping state in client
5.send individual, multiple or every channel data from client to server, generate and download the .m3u file
